metadata.feature_description: Manages file metadata including title, description, tags, and system attributes like archive, hidden, read-only

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel and open file details for test_image.png
steps.expected: File details panel opens with editable fields
steps.actual: File details panel opened successfully showing Name, Title, Description fields

steps.action: Enter 'Test Image Title' in the Title field
steps.actual: Title field accepted 'Test Image Title' input

steps.action: Enter description text in the Description field
steps.actual: Description field accepted 'This is a test image for metadata testing'

steps.action: Type 'test-tag' in the Tags field and press Enter
steps.expected: Tag is added to the file
steps.actual: Tag 'test-tag' was successfully added and displayed as a chip with remove button

steps.action: Click the remove (X) button on the test-tag
steps.expected: Tag is removed from the file
steps.actual: Tag 'test-tag' was successfully removed, Tags field now empty

steps.action: Toggle the Archive attribute to On
steps.actual: Archive toggle switched to On (blue) state

steps.action: Toggle the Hidden attribute to On
steps.actual: Hidden toggle switched to On (blue) state

steps.action: Toggle the Read-Only attribute to On
steps.actual: Read-Only toggle switched to On (blue) state

steps.action: Toggle the System attribute to On
steps.actual: System toggle switched to On (blue) state, all four system attributes now enabled

steps.expected: Publish Period is enabled with date fields visible
steps.actual: Publish Period enabled, Start Date and End Date fields appeared

steps.action: Click End Date field to open date picker
Navigate to March 2026 and select March 31
Click Save button with empty Name field
steps.actual: Red tooltip appeared showing 'Text is required' below the Name field, save blocked

steps.action: Save metadata changes with Title, Description, Tags, and Archive/Hidden attributes
Re-open file details panel to verify saved metadata
steps.expected: All previously saved metadata is retrieved and displayed
steps.actual: All metadata persisted correctly: Title='Test Image Title', Description='This is a test image for metadata testing', Tags='test-tag', Archive=On, Hidden=On

observations: The file details panel provides a comprehensive interface for managing all file metadata properties
System attributes (Archive, Hidden, Read-Only, System) are implemented as toggle switches with clear On/Off states
The Tags feature supports adding multiple tags and displays them as removable chips
Publish Period feature includes a date picker for setting start and end dates
Name field validation correctly prevents saving when the required field is empty
All metadata changes persist correctly after save and are retrieved when reopening the file details
